Reviews.Content: Great location, great views, great price! These apartments were a revelation, ideally situated 5 minutes from Kings Cross and across the wharf from the Royal Botanical Gardens (which take you direct to the Opera House and Circular Quay). For a few dollars extra a Harbour View studio gives you stunning views across the harbour to the Opera House and Darling Harbour. The actual studios are a little shabby (decor circa 1970s!!) but this is more than made up for by the friendliness/helpfulness of the staff, the location and the cost. Book it now!!
Reviews.Author: Alison66
